programme.title: China denies move to capitalism
programme.short_synopsis: Editorial suggesting China's move to a capitalist economy 'flawed', says official.
programme.medium_synopsis: Good news or bad news? China's main daily newspaper rebuked for 'flawed' story of the country's potential move to a capitalist economy.
programme.long_synopsis:
Good news or bad news? China's main daily newspaper rebuked for 'flawed' story of the country's potential move to a capitalist economy.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: China denies move to capitalism

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
